thread.title: Hand injury for Matthews? Peters should be OK for Dallas
thread.title_full: Hand injury for Matthews? Peters should be OK for Dallas

author: Les Bowen
title: Hand injury for Matthews? Peters should be OK for Dallas
text: Eagles Hand injury for Matthews? Peters should be OK for Dallas Sources close to the situation said Jordan Matthews suffered a hand ligament injury three weeks ago that supposedly has resolved, as the WR has labored with dropped passes. Left tackle Jason Peters' dramatic exit from Sunday's game with back spasms looked more ominous than it was; a source said Peters should be OK when the team returns from the bye to play Dallas. Hand injury for Matthews? Peters should be OK for Dallas
